Posts.Content: tre that was beautifully written.   i pray for each case i read about in cancer compass.   i have always known there are more good people than bad in this world.  you are an amazing example of kindness, and give wise suggestions.   dear scared there are always more people praying for us than we ever know.  i am praying for u now.  you will not stay in this uncertain and scared feeling forever.  let all the love that is around you now comfort you.
Posts.Title: Scared
